overview: One night in the rain, a couple with their first child is just doing yoga in the middle of the night. Then a sudden contraction comes to the mother. The couple rushes to the hospital and meets a car that is blocking the road. After a while, the Lecca driver throws Gastan into the couple's car. When he opened his eyes in the morning, he had no wife, and his car was in a deserted forest...
title: Forest
